titleStmt.title: The protestation of the gentry, ministers, free-holders, and other inhabitants of the county of York against a petition drawn up in the name of that county, bearing date the third of June, 1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.N. for Humphrey Tuckey,

notesStmt.note: Asserts that the petition dated 3 June was never presented to the county, and the subscribers repudiate it.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
